description:
// Laura Sobola - Health data: Storage, Ownership and Analysis
Now, more than ever, we are seeing the impact of health data which drives simulations and policy decisions. Therefore, it is very timely to discuss the challenges and opportunities of health data storage and analysis, as well as the various solutions that hold some of our most precious data. Could access to your own medical data the future and if so, how would it be done? What are the current developments in the field? While it is impossible to answer these questions in a single talk, expect to walk away with a better idea about the future of health data.

// About Laura
Laura is a Senior Consultant at Unai and has participated in management and delivery of healthcare related projects, as well as data science projects. She has also recently been awarded the South West Creative Tech Network Data Fellowship, where she is looking at the various issues surrounding the use of genomic data.

// Panelist: Stephanie Campbell
title: BRISTECH: BYTESIZE #6 - LAURA SOBOLA - HEALTH DATA / STEPHANIE CAMPBELL
